animeDescription: Nan Harding is the new student at Mr. and Mrs. Bhaer's school. Everyone thinks that she is a pain in the head, but not Mrs. Jo. Together with the other kids, they all embark on their personal adventures and misfortunes while learning in school.   (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Ai no Wakakusa Monogatari', 'Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei Specials']
